casebody.data:
Thursday, October 19, 2000

MOTION DOCKET

00-1085. Funk v. Rent All Mart, Inc.

Certified Question of State Law, No. 3:00CV7086. This cause came before the court on the certification of a state law question from the United States District Court for the Northern District of Ohio, Western Division. Upon consideration of petitioner’s motion to participate in oral argument scheduled for December 13, 2000,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to participate in oral argument be, and hereby is, denied.
